values: Jonathan Edwards and Revival, Part 2Jonathan Edwards and Revival, Part 2

Jonathan Edwards was used powerfully by God in the First Great Awakening both to promote and assess the revival in New England, as well as to leave behind a fruitful legacy of theological works that have greatly impacted the church.
